answers.answer: I haven't seen anything...or from Dawn (her husband Bill).  Wish we would hear something soon.
I got an email from Dawn, she is home now.  She has be dx with borderline diabetes!~Tascha
GEEZ!  I'm glad she's home...hopefully NOW she will start the healing process.  Thanks for posting the info.
Dang, I figured as much! Hope she heals faster from now on!(((Raynbow

question: Or maybe I missed it.  Been too busy to keep up with the board this last couple of days. . . Love, hugs and God bless, Barb
title: Anyone hear from Sonie???
